description.value: When you cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Humanoid Form] or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Illusory Disguise] to alter your appearance, the spell's duration is 2 hours. At the end of the duration, you can extend the spell's duration for another hour, but doing so is taxing, making you @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Drained]{Drained 1}. You can keep extending it in this way, increasing your drained condition by 1 each time, to a maximum duration of 6 hours.

value.value: ability to cast humanoid form or illusory disguise
